languages.text: "И за то, что я обеспечиваю ведьм этой специей, они меня — снаряжением, едой и защитой. Ценят, получается".

traits.locale_text: "И за то, что я обеспечиваю ведьм этой специей, они меня — снаряжением, едой и защитой. Ценят, получается".
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "So I provide that spice to the Wyches, and they give me equipment, food, and protection. I guess that means my work is appreciated."
languages.original_text: "И за то, что я обеспечиваю ведьм этой специей, они меня — снаряжением, едой и защитой. Ценят, получается".

traits.locale_text: "So I provide that spice to the Wyches, and they give me equipment, food, and protection. I guess that means my work is appreciated."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “因此，我向巫灵教派提供这样的美味，而他们为我提供装备、食物与庇护。我猜，这意味着我的努力得到了奖赏。”
languages.original_text: "So I provide that spice to the Wyches, and they give me equipment, food, and protection. I guess that means my work is appreciated."

traits.locale_text: “因此，我向巫灵教派提供这样的美味，而他们为我提供装备、食物与庇护。我猜，这意味着我的努力得到了奖赏。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「だから私はウィッチにそのスパイスを提供し、代わりに装備や食料を受け取り、保護を約束してもらっています。まあ、それだけ私の仕事に満足しているのでしょうね」
languages.original_text: "So I provide that spice to the Wyches, and they give me equipment, food, and protection. I guess that means my work is appreciated."

traits.locale_text: 「だから私はウィッチにそのスパイスを提供し、代わりに装備や食料を受け取り、保護を約束してもらっています。まあ、それだけ私の仕事に満足しているのでしょうね」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «Les entrego esa especia a las brujas y a cambio me dan equipo, comida y protección. Supongo que eso significa que aprecian mi trabajo».
languages.original_text: "So I provide that spice to the Wyches, and they give me equipment, food, and protection. I guess that means my work is appreciated."

traits.locale_text: «Les entrego esa especia a las brujas y a cambio me dan equipo, comida y protección. Supongo que eso significa que aprecian mi trabajo».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "So I provide that spice to the Wyches, and they give me equipment, food, and protection. I guess that means my work is appreciated."

languages.text: « Moi, je fournis la cerise et en retour, les Cérastes m'offrent de l'équipement, de la nourriture et leur protection. J'imagine que ça veut dire qu'ils apprécient ma contribution. »
languages.original_text: "So I provide that spice to the Wyches, and they give me equipment, food, and protection. I guess that means my work is appreciated."

traits.locale_text: « Moi, je fournis la cerise et en retour, les Cérastes m'offrent de l'équipement, de la nourriture et leur protection. J'imagine que ça veut dire qu'ils apprécient ma contribution. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Also gebe ich den Hekatarii diese Würze, und sie geben mir dafür Ausrüstung, Nahrung und Schutz. Das bedeutet wohl, dass sie meine Arbeit zu schätzen wissen."
languages.original_text: "So I provide that spice to the Wyches, and they give me equipment, food, and protection. I guess that means my work is appreciated."

traits.locale_text: "Also gebe ich den Hekatarii diese Würze, und sie geben mir dafür Ausrüstung, Nahrung und Schutz. Das bedeutet wohl, dass sie meine Arbeit zu schätzen wissen."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Ben Viçlere bu baharatı temin ediyorum, onlar da bana ekipman, yiyecek ve koruma sağlıyor. Bu da çalışmalarımın takdir gördüğü anlamına geliyor işte."
languages.original_text: "So I provide that spice to the Wyches, and they give me equipment, food, and protection. I guess that means my work is appreciated."

traits.locale_text: "Ben Viçlere bu baharatı temin ediyorum, onlar da bana ekipman, yiyecek ve koruma sağlıyor. Bu da çalışmalarımın takdir gördüğü anlamına geliyor sanırım."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
